actions.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to amend the definition of greenhouse gas, to remove water vapor as a part of the definition, strike the removal of existing EPA findings and rules, and exempt all auto standards from the legislation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-54 to amend the definition of greenhouse gas, to remove water vapor as a part of the definition, amend the act by striking the removal of existing EPA findings and rules, and exempt all auto standards from the legislation.
